meanings.definition: To make small changes to something in order to improve its appearance.
meanings.sent1: She tittivated her outfit by adding a colorful scarf.
meanings.sent2: The gardener tittivated the flower bed by planting new blooms.
meanings.sent3: The cat tittivated its fur by grooming meticulously.
meanings.sent4: The artist tittivated the painting with delicate brush strokes.
meanings.sent5: The chef tittivated the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.

meanings.definition: To make something look more attractive by adding small decorative details.
meanings.sent1: He tittivated the room with fairy lights for a cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: The baker tittivated the cake with intricate icing designs.
meanings.sent3: The car owner tittivated the vehicle with shiny new rims.
meanings.sent4: The tailor tittivated the dress with elegant lace trimmings.
meanings.sent5: The teacher tittivated the classroom with colorful posters.
